Scene:
The Otowa Hill
(Otowayama / 音羽山)

Play: The Nunobiki Waterfall (源平布引滝)

Production: October 1974

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)



Performers:

(検非違使)
